title: Roasted beetroot, peach and goat cheese salad
ingredients: ['2 beetroots, scrubbed', "1 (70g) bag lamb's lettuce", '1 (50g) bag rocket', '2 fresh peaches - peeled, pitted and sliced', '2 shallots, chopped', '4 tablespoons pistachio nuts, chopped', '110g fresh goat cheese, crumbled', '4 tablespoons walnut oil', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', 'salt and pepper to taste']
